stimulusHtml: The graphs depict the distribution of intelligence test scores for two groups of students at a middle school. Which of the following statements is true of the graphs?
choicesHtml: The mean and standard deviation are identical for both distributions.
The mean is identical for both distributions; the standard deviation is larger for distribution B.
The mean is identical for both distributions; the standard deviation is larger for distribution A.
The standard deviation is identical for both distributions; the mean is larger for distribution B.
